TLINE.TDLINE: <ZH>CGI Transport request Manager - Application Help</>
Welcome to the CGI TRM application help. Here, you can find all
information to use the application. This tool is a specific solution
developped by CGI for our clients who don't want to deploy the SAP
standard tool, called Solution Manager, in order to check and ensure
thetransport request management.
This reporting tool is used to help the sequencing of SAP transport
requests. Thanks to a user-friendly GUI, this program ensures a better
awareness with our partners while providing an innovative and a
collaborative tool.
This efficient and robust solution is based on SAP standard information
contained in the system. These information are used by SAP to manage
allmodifications done and to deploy them from Development system until
Production system.
This tool contains 3 main blocks :
<ZH>1 - Selection-Screen (Top screen) :</>
This is the first screen displayed when you call the transaction
"YTRM".It will be used to define selection criteria to display
Transportrequest wished. Two selection modes are available :
- By Transport request number
- By Transport request Description
After setting criteria, click on @15@ Execute button to display
transport request information.
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_TOP_SCREEN> Get additional information</>
<ZH>CGI Transport request Manager - Application Help</>
Welcome to the CGI TRM application help. Here, you can find all
information to use the application. This tool is a specific solution
developped by CGI for our clients who don't want to deploy the SAP
standard tool, called Solution Manager, in order to check and ensure
thetransport request management.
This reporting tool is used to help the sequencing of SAP transport
requests. Thanks to a user-friendly GUI, this program ensures a better
awareness with our partners while providing an innovative and a
collaborative tool.
This efficient and robust solution is based on SAP standard information
contained in the system. These information are used by SAP to manage
allmodifications done and to deploy them from Development system until
Production system.
<ZH>2 - ALV - Transport Request Statutes (Middle screen) : </>
This ALV displays the differents statutes with the date and time of
transport requests selected for each system of the SAP client landscape.
Moreover, it displays also several additional information as:
- <ZH>Transport request information :</> Description, owner,
commenttext.
- <ZH>SHERLOCK status :</> If this field is blank, SHERLOCK
isn't yet processed for the transport request
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_MIDDLE_SCREEN> Get additional information</>
This ALV is an interactive ALV. Indeed you process Tool functionality
using the following Toolbar button :
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_CHECK_TR_SYNTAX> Check TR Syntax</> @40@
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_MERGE_TR> Merge TR</>
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_CHANGE_TR_OWNER> Change TR Owner</> @0O@
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_ADD_COMMENT> Add TR Comment text</>
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_EXPORT_EXCEL> Export data to excel file</> @HV@
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_SEQUENCE_TR_LIST> Sequence TR List</>
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_ANALYSE_TR_CONTENT> Analyze TR Content</> @0S@
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_APPLICATION_HELP> Application Help</>
Or also click on some cells of this ALV :
- All Transport request statutes
- Transport request number
- Transport request comment text (only if the following icon
is filled @0P@)
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_HOTSPOT_AREAS> Get more information about interactive
actions</>
<ZH>3 - ALV - Transport Request Object Analyzer (Bottom screen) : </>
This ALV is generated and displayed after clicking on @16@
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_ANALYSE_TR_CONTENT> Analyze TR Content</> button.
The aim of this last ALV is to analyzed all objects included in the
transport requests selected in the TRS ALV and display all versions
generated with a descending sort on creation date (ie First line is
equal to the last object version).
Only Workbench transport request can be analyzed by the tool. Indeed,
customizing ones aren't managed by version.
Unlike to TRS ALV, Toolbar functionalities aren't available with the
TROA ALV. Only interactive actions on ALV cell are kept.
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_BOTTOM_SCREEN> Get additional information</>
